Desc.entry: A re-use project which collects clean, suitable waste from local businesses to provide interesting materials for craft and children's play at low cost to groups (voluntary or statutory) and families catering for children and young people aged under 25 years. Also hires out badge-making machines and fundraising games and provides creative scrap workshops for children's groups and training requirements. Also sells new arts and crafts materials including paint, glue, paper etc. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 4727663.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLES GROUPS - RESOURCES AND SUPPORT SERVICES
